data.title: EPP Group in the European Parliament
data.meta_description: The *EPP Group* is the largest and oldest group in the European Parliament. A centre-right group, we are committed to *creating a stronger and self-assured Europe*, built at the service of its people. Our goal is to create a *more competitive and democratic Europe*, where people can build the life they want.
data.text:
Whether it’s a question about our views, our campaigns or you want to know who your local MEP is, we’d love to hear from you. Or perhaps you have a burning question for Manfred Weber. Whatever it is you need, you can get in touch with us by email or phone, write to us or reach out on social media.

The EPP Group has various information offices across the European Union, which liaise closely with both the Members of the EPP Group and the national authorities in their local country. They share information on the Group's activities and inform the Group on any national issues that may impact its Members' activities.
